Text:
Put it on Mega Up Load. Put the following after that Dot Com.

/?d=PKZOPSMG

I have seeded this to over a 3 ratio, have watched it, and want to remove it from my computer, but so many people are still downloading from me...

Here is how I have chosen to help further and still remove it from my pc. I have uploaded to Mega Up Load, so download from there and become an instant seed!

Put the following after the Dot Com:
/?d=PKZOPSMG 
(sorry for the cryptic message, it won't let me post the full link in a comment for some reason!)

Enjoy
